name: David Wessman
body:
### About me
I live in the southern part of Sweden, in Lund.
I study engineering with focus on e.g. physics and computer science.

### Programming
I started out with programming scripts for using a bot to play an MMORPG me and my friends played when I was younger. I moved on to learning some `C#` trying out `WinForms`, `WPF`and some other `.NET` products. Got in touch with _web development_ when working with a  few `WordPress`sites.

When moving to university I studied some `Object-oriented` programming by learning `Java`.
As a project I got into `Ruby` to learn some `Ruby on Rails` when developing a website for a student organization.

### Work
I worked as a __sailing coach__ teaching kids how to sail for a few summers. Then I started working at a local company with installing robotic lawnmowers. Also handled the website of this company and developed a `.NET`native application for handling work flow.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
